method.title: LocalTuyaIR Remote Control
method.description:
This integration will allow you use your Tuya universal remote control device with Home Assistant locally, without the need for the Tuya cloud.

To access your Tuya Remote Control device, we need to know its local encryption key. This step can be a bit tricky, so please see the documentation for more information.

Please select the method you want to use to configure your Tuya Remote Control device.
